welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kotsyubyns'ke, Ukraine! Get ready to experience the charm of this quaint city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Kotsyubyns'ke has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gostomel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The main terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: A newer terminal, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
